title: Soft Microfiber Flower Cap Towel for Women ? Quick Dry Hair Wrap with Cute Bow Design, Super Absorbent Shower & Bath Turban for Smooth, Frizz-Free Hair (Random Color)
description:
Keep your hair dry and stylish after every shower with this Flower Cap Towel. Made from super absorbent and soft microfiber, it quickly dries your hair without causing frizz or damage. The elastic, comfortable fit keeps the towel securely in place, while the adorable bow design adds a cute touch. Perfect for use after bathing, swimming, or during skincare routines. Available in multiple vibrant colors to match your mood!

Features:

Ultra-soft & quick-drying microfiber materialGentle on hair ? reduces breakage and frizzStretchable elastic fit for all head sizesCute bow accent for a fashionable lookIdeal for home, travel, and spa useColor Random
